Actions.Name: Pay the Ferryman
Effects: This attack breaks master cloak. If this attack breaks Master cloak, deals added base damage equal to twice the round number plus twice the number of valuables tokens the [name] is holding.
The [name] may teleport 2 spaces before and after the attack.

Actions.Name: Mug
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe is dazed. If they have a valuables token, that foe takes 3 damage, then the [name] gains a valuables token.

Combo.Name: Swindle
Combo.Description: Swap places with a character in range 3, teleporting. Foes can save to avoid this effect.

Actions.Name: Blinding Bomb
Actions.Description: The [name] throws blinding dust at a small blast location in range. Characters within take [fray] damage and must save or become blinded.

Actions.Name: Drop Caltrops
Actions.Description: The [name] creates a line 3 area of difficult and dangerous terrain.
